@description.name: @description
@description.body: Defines the callback for the single selection manager.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the elements which are part of the selection.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns whether the given item is selectable.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: item {qx.ui.core.Widget} The item to be checked

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Boolean} Whether the given item is selectable
@return.description: Whether the given item is selectable
